title: Chinese Spiced Fried Pork
ingredients: ['450g boneless pork chops, pounded evenly and cut into large pieces', 'Seasoning', '1/4 teaspoon Chinese five spice', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1 large egg, beaten', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '125ml oil', '1/2 tablespoon finely chopped red chillies', '3 tablespoons finely chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, diced', '1/3 teaspoon salt', '1 green pepper, diced (optional)', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon seasoned salt']
